content.p: Prayer rooms are available 24 hours a day for Muslim students on the ground floor of the Computer Centre and within the Islamic Centre. The nearest mosque is in Semenyih. On Fridays, there is a free bus service scheduled around lunchtime to transport students there. There is one Hindu temple in Semenyih, with Kajang as the next closest destination. Buddhist temples can be located in Semenyih, Broga and Kajang; while Christian churches are available in Semenyih and Kajang. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
